post:
Well we had emailed this offer over to LEB a month ago, but they seem to be way behind on posting offers so their loss is your gain..

No coupon codes required... Hurry fast as these will sellout quickly.

This plan is out of the Jacksonville, FL GoRack Data Center.
We own and operate all of our own servers.
**

Plan Name: LEB1024 OpenVZ**

    Processor Speed: 3.4Ghz (Intel E3-1270 Processors)
    Processor Cores: 2 CPUs
    Guaranteed RAM: 1024MB
    Burst RAM/vSwap: 1536MB
    Disk Space: 100GB
    Monthly Premium Bandwidth: 800GB
    Included IP Addresses: 1 IP
    Network Port Speed: 100Mbps
    
    **Price: 4.95 / month**
    **Signup Link:** https://www.cortexnetworks.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=80

Available Extras:

Additional IP Addresses: $.50 /each

cPanel VPS License - $15 /month
Softaculous VPS License - $2 /month
Direct Admin VPS License - $9 /month

Limitations:

No warez
No SPAM or Bulk Emailing
Private proxies only
No IRC
No flooding, scanning, penetration testing, DDOSing, etc.
Basically anything else that will cause issues with your neighboring VPS's.

We are over 2 1/2 year old company and registered LLC with the state of Florida.
